author: ehillenius
msg: it is better to just include the yahoo-min.js dependency directly instead of setting the global base dir for YUI (which could interfere with users trying to use the YUI loader for their own purposes).

author: davi
msg: The last two arguments to APR_DBM_FETCH were inverted, causing the datum of
the key to be used as the return datum and vice-versa. Found while investigating
